ðŸ‘‹ Hey, I am Max, Co-Founder at magier & Wizard Ventures!

I built my first internet projects when I was 13 and ever since, I have been living my dream life of being an entrepreneur. But since then, a lot has happened:

â–¶ Co-Founded EdTech StudyHelp and scaled to 7+ digits in revenue & >1M monthly users
â–¶ Raised >$5M myself and over >$100M for the ventures I helped
â–¶ Invested in 25+ companies and funds as an angel
â–¶ Exited 3 companies (VCStack, Startup&VC, BaseTemplates, tona)
â–¶ Shared my lessons in places like Inc, Forbes, Tech.eu, and ProductHunt

Nowadays, I am building my internet holding company, Wizard Ventures, including my main project magier (Design-as-a-Service).

ðŸ‘€ What will you find on my profile?

My purpose in everything I do is to enable growth. That's why I am sharing founder-focused actionable insights, how-tos, and shortcuts to grow your startup.
